questions.name: What is the capital of France?
questions.explain: The capital of France is Paris.

questions.name: What color is the sky on a clear day?
questions.explain: The sky is blue on a clear day.

questions.name: Which planet is known as the Red Planet?
questions.explain: Mars is known as the Red Planet.

questions.name: Who wrote 'To Kill a Mockingbird'?
questions.explain: 'To Kill a Mockingbird' was written by Harper Lee.

questions.name: What is the boiling point of water?
questions.explain: The boiling point of water is 100°C.

questions.name: What is the largest ocean on Earth?
questions.explain: The largest ocean on Earth is the Pacific Ocean.

questions.name: Which animal is known as the King of the Jungle?
questions.explain: The lion is known as the King of the Jungle.

questions.name: What is the chemical symbol for gold?
questions.explain: The chemical symbol for gold is Au.

questions.name: In which year did the Titanic sink?
